episodes.title: Lady Thalestris - High Priestess/Founder Of The Temple Of Hecate Returns!
episodes.description:
Join us for another visit from Lady Thalestris - High Priestess/Founder Of The Temple Of Hecate!

Repost from Witches of New York/Ieva Sireikyte: Portrait of the Witch//C. Laurie Bizzarro, M.A., J.D. aka Lady Thalestris is a Daughter of Hecate. She is the High Priestess and Founder of The Temple of Hecate, Inc. and the acting High Priestess of The New York Coven of Witches. She began practicing Wicca in 2003. She trained with Wiccans of the Crossroads and was initiated in the Crossroads tradi...tion (Witches/Wiccans of the Crossroads) as a Third Degree High Priestess and Daughter of Hecate on May 30, 2009. She was High Priestess of Wiccans of the Crossroads from 2007 until she formed Enchanted Crossroads Coven and Grove in 2012. She is also a Third Degree High Priestess in the New York Coven of Welsh Traditional Witches. She was elevated to Third Degree in the New York Wica/Gardnerian Tradition by Lady Rhea on March 23, 2019. She has organized and lead rituals at various festivals in the Tri-State area, including organizing and leading the current monthly Hecate Rituals held in the New York City area and the first Hecate Intensive held in upstate New York in October 2019. She has lectured at the college level on the subject of Wicca and Paganism and has organized a lecture series for the same. She is the proprietor of The Law Office of C. Laurie Bizzarro, P.C. representing Plaintiffs in personal injury, construction accidents and employment litigation.

He is the author of the upcoming book Psychic Witch: A Metaphysical Guide To Meditation, Magick & Manifestation (Llewellyn, 2020). He writes the blog For Puck’s Sake on Patheos Pagan, is a content creator for Modern Witch, has a column in Witches & Pagans Magazine entitled 'Extra-Sensory Witchcraft', a column in Horns Magazine, and is a regular contributor to The Witches’ Almanac. She is a magical practitioner/voodoo priestess with training in several traditions, including Celtic, Afro-Caribbean (Santeria and Vodun), and Native American spiritualties. Her traditional education focused on plant science, anthropology, and film. She owns her own magickal consulting business, Branwen’s Pantry, and is editor/publisher of Oshun-African Magickal Quarterly. She has a degree in anthropology from the University of Rhode Island and an MFA from New York University’s Tisch School of the Arts.

episodes.title: Therapist - Witch - Author : The Crooked Path of Kelden
episodes.description:
The Crooked Path

AN INTRODUCTION TO TRADITIONAL WITCHCRAFT

Part the thorny bramble and take a walk along the bewitchingly mysterious Crooked Path. Within these pages discover a wealth of hands-on tips and techniques to begin your journey into the realm of Traditional Witchcraft. Learn to weave a powerful personal practice that is informed by folklore and grounded in your own location and natural landscape. Along the way you will find valuable information regarding the tools, rituals, and spells of this fascinating tradition, together with lessons on connecting with deities, familiar spirits, ancestors, and the spirits of place. With supportive advice and encouragement, Kelden provides everything you need to successfully navigate your own path, helping you master even advanced practices such as hedge-crossing as you transform your day-today experience into a life filled with magic and spirit.

episodes.title: Lon Milo DuQuette
episodes.description:
I couldn't believe our luck when Lon Milo DuQuette (musician, esoteric scholar and the author of sixteen critically acclaimed books on magick and the occult, including Enochian Vision Magick and The Chicken Qabalah of Rabbi Lamed Ben Clifford. - see http://www.LonDuQuette.com) agreed to be on to discuss the book he co-edited with David Shoemaker -

Llewellyn's Complete Book of Ceremonial Magick:

A Comprehensive Collection of Magical Wisdom in One Indispensable Book

Llewellyn's Complete Book of Ceremonial Magick brings together the myriad occult philosophies and techniques necessary for a thorough understanding of the esoteric arts. This magnificent treasury is filled with fascinating insights from today's most esteemed working practitioners, developing the rich details of a dozen topics that together comprise the Western Mystery Tradition. Within these pages, you will explore the rituals and ideas that have shaped the history and modern practice of magick. Edited by virtuoso occultists Lon Milo DuQuette and David Shoemaker, this brilliant collection of new writings is the preeminent reference work on the occult arts and sciences.  

Please join us for what promises to be an amazing hour!

episodes.title: OUTSIDE THE CHARMED CIRCLE WITH MISHA MAGDALENE
episodes.description:
Misha Magdalene is a multi-classed, multi-geek, multi-queer witch with a degree in gender studies, and the author of OUTSIDE THE CHARMED CIRCLE: EXPLORING GENDER & SEXUALITY IN MAGICAL PRACTICE (Llewellyn, January 2020). They're an initiate of multiple lines of traditional witchcraft, including Anderson Feri and Gardnerian Wicca, and have also been known to dabble recklessly in both modern ceremonial magic and grimoiric goetia. They've been blogging since 2001, negotiating the online world since 1987, playing Dungeons & Dragons since 1981, and listening to weird music since birth. A native of California, they spent several formative years in upstate South Carolina, and now live on occupied Duwamish territory in the Seattle area with their polymath wife, their precocious daughter, and two adorably destructive black kittens.


Website: mishamagdalene.com

Twitter: @MishaMagdalene

Instagram: @mishamagdalene

Facebook: facebook.com/MishaMagdalene

Blog: patheos.com/blogs/mishamagdalene/

Llewellyn author page: https://www.llewellyn.com/author.php?author_id=6362

Book page: https://www.llewellyn.com/product.php?ean=9780738761329

episodes.title: Mat Auryn - author of the upcoming book Psychic Witch
episodes.description:
Join us as we have our first visit from an all-around amazing talent - Mat Auryn!

Mat Auryn is a witch, writer, psychic, and occult teacher. He is an initiate of Black Rose Witchcraft, the Temple of Witchcraft Tradition, the Cabot Tradition, and a priest in the Sacred Fires Tradition of Witchcraft. He is the author of the upcoming book Psychic Witch: A Metaphysical Guide To Meditation, Magick & Manifestation (Llewellyn, 2020). He writes the blog For Puck’s Sake on Patheos Pagan, is a content creator for Modern Witch, has a column in Witches & Pagans Magazine entitled 'Extra-Sensory Witchcraft', a column in Horns Magazine, and is a regular contributor to The Witches’ Almanac. He has been featured in various magazines, radio shows, podcasts, books, anthologies, newspapers, and other periodicals. Visit him online at MatAuryn.com.

episodes.title: Manny Tejeda-Moreno
episodes.description:
Manny Tejeda-Moreno (pronouns he, him, his) is a professor and social scientist. His doctorate is in business and his scholarship has been focused in research methods, spirituality and diversity. He also has a masters degree in psychotherapy. Manny was born in Cuba and raised in the American South. He has been in the Pagan community for almost four decades. He is a witch and was raised as a child of Oyá. He is encouraged by the Balance within the natural world, enjoys storms and the night. Manny is married and splits his free time between the Florida Swamps and the Atlantic Ocean. He is also a beekeeper, orchid-grower and builder of bat houses. He is also the National Pursewarden for CoG and Chronicler for ADF

You can read a few of his Wild Hunt Articles Here and Here

episodes.title: Thorn Mooney
episodes.description: Thorn Mooney is a witch living near us in Charlotte, North Carolina. A working Gardnerian priestess with a strong solitary practice that relies on techniques culled from as assortment of Western esoteric traditions and what is sometimes called “traditional” witchcraft. Heavily influenced by an extensive academic background, having specialized in American religions, evangelical Christianity, and contemporary Paganism at the MA level. She moonlights as a lecturer and independent scholar, but professionally she now works as a public high school teacher. She is the high priestess of Foxfire Coven, which is a traditional Gardnerian inner and outer court operating in the University area of Charlotte. Her first book, Traditional Wicca, A Seekers Guide, is available now. Other interests include historical fencing, vintage guitars, long-distance hiking, traditional archery and bowhunting, and running.

episodes.title: Morgan Daimler
episodes.description: Morgan Daimler is a witch who follows a path inspired by the Irish Fairy Faith. A wandering priestess of the aos sidhe, Morgan teaches classes on Irish myth and magical practices, fairies, and related subjects around the United States. Morgan’s writing has appeared in a variety of magazines and anthologies including By Blood, Bone, and Blade: A Tribute to the Morrigan and Naming the Goddess. Morgan is also the author of a variety of books including the urban fantasy/paranormal romance series Between the Worlds, and through Moon Books Where the Hawthorn Grows, Pagan Portals Fairy Witchcraft, Pagan Portals The Morrigan, Pagan Portals Irish Paganism, Pagan Portals Brigid, and Pagan Portals Gods and Goddesses of Ireland. Morgan blogs regularly at Living Liminally.

episodes.title: Author Heather Greene
episodes.description:
Author and Managing Editor of The Wild Hunt, Heather Greene joins us to talk about her forthcoming book, Witches on Screen: A Critical History of American Film and Television Portrayals. Available for pre order now.

"From The Wizard of Oz to The Craft and beyond, this book is a focused look at how a powerful and well-loved and sometimes feared character, the witch, entered, developed, and shifted within narrative productions over time, reflecting the culture’s negotiation of gender roles, religion, the burgeoning modern practice of Witchcraft, and the overarching power of female agency."

We are excited to speak with Heather and hope you'll join us for a fun evening talking about our favorite subject....Witches!

episodes.title: Tonie Ervin, Beatles Esbat
episodes.description:
Our favorite Evil Twin, Tonie Ervin, returns with another awesome Esbat.....Elton John Esbat featuring the music of the Beatles. If you caught the episode about the Elton John Esbat, you know how fun these events are. Held in the natural environment of NC Piedmont Church of Wicca's Circle, These Esbats raise power through corresponding songs that we all know, by bands or artists we all love. 

 

If you would like to make a donation toward NCPCOW, you can find their contact information HERE.

episodes.title: Taliesin Govannon
episodes.description:
Taliesin and Raina chat about US Politics and what else is going on around the globe. Politics changes at an alarming rate now, so you never know what political tapas are going to be on the menu for the evening.

Join Taliesin and Raina as they tiptoe through this month's political mine field.

episodes.title: Jade Sol Luna
episodes.description:
Our favorite Asterian Astrologer, Jade Sol Luna joins us to talk about what's going on in the Universe and with his band, Luna 13.

We will be joined shortly in the first half hour by Star Bustamonte, to do a recap of the Mystic South Convention that took place July 21-23.

episodes.title: Live From Mystic South
episodes.description: Raina is on the scene of Mystic South's Inaugural Conference and will be possibly chatting with a guest or two. This will be the first of it's kind for our show, so come join in on the adventure.

episodes.title: David Salisbury
episodes.description: Author, reader and activist, David Salisbury joins us again to tell us what's going on in his world and what he's working on. We will touch on The Firefly House, and how abandoning dogma in his practices has helped or hindered his magick.

episodes.title: Taliesin Govannon
episodes.description: From the man himself, "Getting closer to the smoking gun: Evidence of collusion reaches the White House" He will also be discussing his upcoming Starwood workshop on Russiagate.

episodes.title: Free Night
episodes.description: Raina and Dorian chat about magick and what's going on in their world.....with a few rants more than likely thrown in.

episodes.title: Dorothy Morrison, Mystic South & Solstice
episodes.description: We have a lot to cover as Witch extraordinaire, Dorothy Morrison joins us to talk about Mystic South, Solstice and what has been going on in her world. Don't forget to stop by Wicked Witch Studios and get your Dorothy goodies!

episodes.title: Star Bustamonte & Raina Starr
episodes.description:
Star and Raina discuss the forthcoming Mystic South Conference, (July 21-23.) These lovely ladies take over the show and you never know what else will be up for discussion. Come join the fun.

 

Dorian will be on the road, so there will be no chat room this evening.

episodes.title: Taliesin Govannon
episodes.description: Come join the covfefe...I mean, conversation....or maybe that word was for confetti? Regardless, we will be talking politics with the Pagan Pundit himself, Taliesin Govannon.

episodes.title: Courtney Weber
episodes.description: Courtney Weber is a Wiccan priestess, writer, tarot adviser, and activist recently returning to her native Oregon after 13 years in New York City. A Tarot reader for more than twenty years, Courtney is the author of Tarot for One: The Art of Reading for Yourself and Brigid: History, Mystery, and Magick of the Celtic Goddess  (Weiser Books). Courtney produced and designed Tarot of the Boroughs, a modern tarot deck set in New York City, composed of original photography. She has also been published on Huffington Post, The Wild Hunt, in Circle Times magazine, and elsewhere. Visit her online at The Coco Witch and on Twitter.

episodes.title: Jade Sol Luna
episodes.description: Jade joins us to talk about the moon in Scorpio, the alignment of the other planets and what that means for us. He will also be talking about his award winning Deathtronica band, Luna 13 and what projects he and Lilith Bathory have in the works.

episodes.title: Taliesin Govannon
episodes.description: From Taliesin himself, "Democrats have already tied Michael Flynn to Mike Pence in a way that may spell the end of his political career." Could this mean when Trump gets impeached that Pence won't be taking over? Tune in to find out.

episodes.title: Star Bustamonte
episodes.description: Appalacian Witch, Star Bustamonte returns to talk more in depth about the upcoming Mystic South and what's going on with our neighboring Witches.

episodes.title: Dorothy Morrison
episodes.description: The incomparable Dorohy Morrison joins us for our quarterly chat about what's going on in her world and ours. She has launched her Spell of the Month and if you are not following her on social media, you are missing out!

episodes.title: Episode 200 with Taliesin Govannon
episodes.description: Taliesin Govannon joins us for our 200th episode to talk about what's going on in the world of politics. Did the administration collude with Russia and if so, what does that mean? Will the Dems be able to filibuster the Supreme Court nominee? Tune in to find out!

episodes.title: Byron Ballard
episodes.description: Gatherer, cove doctor, rootwoman and independent forensic folklorist and one of the coolest Apalacian Village Witches we know. Byron Ballard joins us to chat with the Southern city Witches. You can also follow her here on Twitter.

episodes.title: Star Bustamonte
episodes.description:
The director of Mystic South, Star Bustamonte, joins us to chat about the upcoming Southern based Pagan festival. The where, Atlanta GA. The when, July 21-23. The how, register here! The who, our beloved Dorothy Morrison among other featured guests.

Come find out why, this Friday!

episodes.title: Author Ly de Angeles
episodes.description:
Author, (Witchcraft Theory and Practice,) tarot reader, paleo (almost), scholar, activist and all around extraordinary witch, Ly de Angeles joins us from the other side of the globe in Australia. Ly is an indigenous Briton, Catuvellauni, which we are very much looking forward to discussing and being educated on. 

We hope you'll join us in welcoming Ly and please, check out her informational videos beforehand.

episodes.title: Jade Sol Luna
episodes.description: Jade joins us to talk about his new album release with Luna 13, Dark Side of The Sun which will be featured, (he and Lilith Bathory perform,) in the movie, Devil's Domain starring Michael Madsen. We will aslo touch on Venus Retrograde and whatever else pops up.

episodes.title: Dragon Ritual Drummer's Witchdoctor Utu
episodes.description: Witchdoctor Utu, (and possibly other members,) of Dragon Ritual Drummers joins us for an evening of fun. We will chat about what's on the schedule for the year ahead and any special projects they have in the works.

episodes.title: Dorothy Morrison Month
episodes.description: The Mistress of Mojo herself joins us to chat and talk about her Kick Ass Social Media Sale. Come celebrate Dorothy Morrison month with us!

episodes.title: Jade Sol Luna
episodes.description: Jade joins us to talk about music and the current state of the stars. We are currently in the six months of rest that he spoke about during his last appearance. What does it mean for the current state of the world and what are some cautions we can take?

episodes.title: Taliesin Govannon
episodes.description: Taliesin joins us for our monthly chat about magick, music, pop culture and politics. You can follow him on Twitter to keep up to date between shows... HERE

episodes.title: Imbolc
episodes.description: Imbolc and musings. Grab a mug of something warm and gather around the fireside.

episodes.title: Free Night
episodes.description: Raina and Dorian chat about the week's events, possibly peppered with a rant or two.

episodes.title: Friday the 13th w/ Taliesin
episodes.description: Full moon on Friday the 13th, oh yes! Get ready to recharge Witches.

episodes.title: Goodbye 2016, w/ Jade Sol Luna
episodes.description:
As we come to the end of one of the most harrowing years of the millenium, we turn to our friend Jade for a glimmer of hope for 2017.

We will find out what the stars have in mind for us and Jade's band, Luna 13. Keep your fingers crossed and also tune in to get some tips for magickal workings during the New Year!

episodes.title: The Chat Before Xmas
episodes.description: Once again, it's that time of year.....peace on Earth, good will toward people......well, as long as you don't go anywhere near a mall or shopping center. We'll be chatting about what our plans are, like Dorian's Seconal Annual Xjammaganza, and maybe some tips on dealing with not so happy gatherings.

episodes.title: Yuletime Free Night
episodes.description: Can never be quite sure where the conversation will deviate to with these Sister Witches. Come join in on the fun

episodes.title: The Aftermath w/ Taliesin
episodes.description: Don't fear, the eternal optimist here has some positive stuff to share with his political minions! We will be talking politics, magick and trying to spread some Holiday cheer.

episodes.title: Jades-giving
episodes.description: We're always grateful when Jade comes to visit. Now that we are stuffed with food and in the midst of the dark half of the year, we hope to hear of some light coming our way. We will also catch up on what he's doing with his music, Luna 13

episodes.title: Holiday Magick w/ Dorothy Morrison
episodes.description:
Y'all know that when Miss Dorothy comes to visit, she comes toting some amazing goodies! Join us as we dive into her Holiday Sale going on right now. Buy one for you and for the other Witches in your life.

 

Don't despair if you live outside the States, you can still get these from The Angry Cauldron.

episodes.title: Countdown Till Election Day
episodes.description:
Raina takes the reins with Taliesin Govannon to talk about the pending election on November 8th. 

Join them to find out what their predictions are for this historic election.

episodes.title: Free Night
episodes.description: Free night, where the conversation is up for grabs. Come join us as we touch on the dark half of the year.

episodes.title: Free Night
episodes.description:
Time for another free night! Who knows what we'll wind up talking about. Will we continue the saga of Raina's malodorous coworker? What's happening in the suburban housewitch life of Dorian......*hint* she got a new stove. Tune in for the ruckus Friday the 14th to find out! 

 

Please visit our sponsor's;

Wicked Witch Studios

The Angry Cauldron

Cobaltraven's Magickal Notions

(If you would like to become a sponsor, please contact us at desperatehousewitches@gmail.com )

Around the Cauldron

episodes.title: Taliesin Govannon
episodes.description: Taliesin returns to talk about politics with Raina. With only 5 weeks until election day, and such a tight race, what will happen? This has most certainly been an election for the record books.

episodes.title: Jade and the Black Moon
episodes.description: Jade Sol Luna joins us to talk about his music and what's going on in Asterian Astrology. We hope you're all set for the Black Moon as well.

episodes.title: Dorothy Morrison
episodes.description:
The incomparable Dorothy Morrison joins us once again for a raucous time and to lay down some magical knowledge. She will give us a hint or two at her up coming offerings and talk about her mainstays.

You are in for a magickal evening!

episodes.title: Jade Sol Luna
episodes.description: The ever awesome Jade Sol Luna joins us to talk about what's in the stars for us Earthly Heathens and his band, Luna 13.

episodes.title: Queen Esbat w/ Tonie Ervin
episodes.description:
What is a Queen Esbat you ask? Well, pretty much like an Elton John Esbat, but featuring the music of Queen. Still confused? Let me explain....

Long time friend of Desperate House Witches, (going on 17 years), Tonie Ervin came up with the most creative Esbat held at NCPCOW, I have ever had the honor of participating in....she set everything to a sound track of her favorite artist in the world, Elton John. It was powerful and emotional, singing to well know and well coordinated tracks to call the quarters as well as the Lord and Lady. Hands down, the most unique ceremony I have ever taken part in. I am looking forward to this years Esbat as, while I am a huge fan of Elton, I'm an even bigger fan of Freddie.

So we welcome general all around badass, (did I mention she and her husband also run Mystic Artisans?), Tonie for the first time.

episodes.title: After The Primaries
episodes.description:
Tailiesin Govannon joins the program to discuss the Primaries, RNC & the DNC with Raina Starr and what's up next in the world of politics. 

 

 

 

*Opinions stated on this program do not necessarily reflect those of the Desperate House Witches staff*

episodes.title: Free Night
episodes.description: You never know what subject we'll get going on as we usually cover many. We got interupted by Mother Nature during our last Free Night, so we have lots to make up for.

episodes.title: Judika Illes
episodes.description: We are happy to have Judika Illes return to our show and talk about her new book, The Big Book of Practical Spells and her up coming appearances. You can read more about Judika on our blog, Around the Cauldron.

episodes.title: Jade Said it Would Be Like This
episodes.description: What the heck is going on? If you tuned into Jade's last show, he had already given us a heads up on what was coming. How long will this last?

episodes.title: The Sad Saga of Cheeto-Jesus
episodes.description: Taliesin wanted the title to be, "Donald Trump's poll numbers are going down faster than a Kardashian on spring break!", but that was a bit long. The race is still not over, so what's next? Hill may clinch the democratic nomination, but what about the other woman running for President, Jill Stein? Some Sanders supporters have sworn not to support Clinton, so could we see a Green Party President?

episodes.title: Danette Wilson
episodes.description:
Our friend and Columnist for The Angry Cauldron, (Red Witches Journey), and Patheos, joins us to tell of her adventure in New Orleans!

 

"Let me be your portal as I take you to the magical and mysterious voodoo side of new orleans that most do not see.


The haunted stories and places where spirits dwell, the fabulous gumbo pot of french, spanish, irish, italian, nat. american, african cultures.


Find out the difference between cajon and creole, and all about mojo, juju, gris gris, and the Voodoo of dances, drums and veves, bones, herbs and dust.


Hear what haunted the set of American Horror Story when they were in NOLA ?


Leave your capes and swords at the door darlin, we're goin deep and primal and embarking on a whole different magical realm."

episodes.title: Jade Sol Luna
episodes.description: Asterian Astrologer, Author and Musician, Jade Sol Luna joins us once again to fill us in on what's going on in the Universe and in his musical career. You never know what we'll wind up talking about though. Always a fun show when Jade drops by!

episodes.title: Devin Hunter
episodes.description:
Author Devin Hunter returns with new projects, writings in the works,(You can preorder The Witches Book of Power), his Modern Witches Podcast, and what life is like at the Mystic Dream.

He is also a teacher and a Priest heading up Black Rose Witchcraft.

episodes.title: Catching Up With Taliesin
episodes.description: Taliesin fills us in on this insane election.

episodes.title: Happy Birthday Dorothy Morrison!
episodes.description: We kick off the Mistress of Mojo's Birthday month by speaking with the Lady herself. You know she never shows up empty handed and the presents are all for you! Right now she has the coolest sale yet going on over at Wicked Witch Studios, but this is one of her special Social Media Sales. So head on over and order a Magical Mystery Package of your own before you join us tonight for a spell and certainly, a few laughs.

episodes.title: Jade Sol Luna
episodes.description:
Jade Sol Luna joins us to fill us in on what's been going on with his music, Luna 13, and what's going on in the cosmos. We currently have five planets in retrograde. 

You never know what subjects will come up when the three of us get to chatting, so tune in to see where on the wheel we land.

episodes.title: Ivo Domínguez Jr.
episodes.description:
Author, Witch, Astrologer and Elder in the Wiccan community, Ivo Domínguez Jr. joins us to talk about his many projects including the Alexandrian Library. 

Read more about our amazing guest in our blog post...
http://desperatehousewitches.blogspot.com/2016/04/ivo-dominguez-jr.html?m=1

episodes.title: Author Christopher Penczak
episodes.description: Author, Healer and Teacher, Christoper Penczak joins us for an evening of Magickal chat. Click on the hyperlink to read our blog for more information on this mover and shaker in the Pagan community.

episodes.title: April Fools and Politics
episodes.description:
Happy April Fools Day, we will be discussing some of the actual fools in the Washington arena. What did Donald say this week, the Cruz scandal,  the Primaries, the impact of bigoted Pat McCrory and so much more!

Tune in to find out.

episodes.title: Guest, Author Tonia Brown
episodes.description:
One of our favorite friends to the show and Mistress of Occult fiction returns to talk about her upcoming book release, Friend of the Devil. If you haven't read the first book, Badass Zombie Road Trip, you may want to get them together. After you read those, go get the rest of her books, you'll want to!

You can find more information about Tonia HERE on her website.

episodes.title: Free Night
episodes.description: Just a short show of Raina and Dorian chatting about on going events, rants, upcoming Holidays and what's up magickally speaking.

episodes.title: The Trumpducky Derby
episodes.description:
As we all stand by, gobsmacked at the anticts of the GOP, are we also watching their slow implosion? "The Donald" is bulldozing his way to the top. The worse he gets, the more violent his rabid followers get....will it ever be too much? While the other side stays civil between the candidate, the race tightens.

 

Join us to find out what in the world is going on.

episodes.title: Free Night
episodes.description:
If you have been a long time listener, you know free nights can go anywhere on the conversation spectrum. If you're a new listener, welcome! Come have a seat by the hearth with us. Don't forget to check out our newly launched Pagan blog, Around The Cauldron, with new posts from Raina Starr and Danette Wilson every Sunday. Visit our sponsors, The Angry Cauldron.

If you would like to advertise with us, please contact Dorian Wallace at desperatehousewitches@gmail.com

episodes.title: Happy 4 Year Anniversary!
episodes.description: We've done a lot in 4 years and we've got more up our sleeves. We've had some amazing guests, some laughs and tears, so what's next for Raina and Dorian? Tune in for our special announcement to see what we have planned for the next year. We will be joined by a friend who is part of this announcment as well.

episodes.title: Free Night,Valentines Edition
episodes.description: You know free nights can be about anything. Tune in to find out what's weighing on our minds. We will touch on the upcoming holiday all about love and our project.

episodes.title: Caucus Raucous
episodes.description: The Pagan Pundit joins us to explain the impact the Caucuses really have on the run for the Presidency. Who is still in the race, who has dropped out, and has Jeb finally lost his patience?

episodes.title: Everything's Coming Up Dorothy!
episodes.description:
The Mistress of Mojo joins us with her amazing bag of goodies. I hear that Mary Poppins gets her supplies from our favorite Witch ;) Whether you need someone to permanently vacate or stay, she has the perfect oil, spray or candle to get the job done. As of Febuary 1st, she is launching her Kick Ass Social Media Sale, so keep an eye out for the link.

You can peruse her other offerings HERE beforehand, check out her Website, or follow her on Facebook.

episodes.title: Jade Sol Luna
episodes.description:
Jade 's return is just in time to talk about the death that seems to be plaguing the last few months and last few weeks especially. 
Join us for a night of Asterian Astrology with the maestro himself. 

http://www.jadesolluna.com/

episodes.title: Free Night
episodes.description: You never know what you're going to hear during free nights, when the conversation turns into an adventure.

episodes.title: New Year with Taliesin Govannon
episodes.description: It's a New Year and we're starting it with the awesome Pagan Pundit, Taliesin Govannon. A lot has transpired since last month, from Y'allqueda taking over a Federal building to the Birther movement being turned on Ted Cruz. Come play catch up with us and have a few laughs in the process.

episodes.title: Guest Renee Sosanna Olson
episodes.description:
Sosanna's Closet offers a unique variety of handmade Pagan products, from tee shirts, candles, jewlery and more. Wonderful gifts for the discerning witch in your life, you'll want to grab one for yourself as well! A vibrant soul that we are lucky enough to know personally. 

Happy Yule!

 

Sosanna's Facebook

Sosanna's Website

episodes.title: The Incomparable Dorothy Morrison
episodes.description:
The amazing Mistress of Mojo joins us again for a night of fun, magick and to catch us up on her latest adventures. Always a fun night when the owner of Wicked Witch Studios joins us, you never know what we may wind up talking about. 

You can keep up with Dorothy on her Facebook Page or visit the Morrison Manor!

episodes.title: What in the World with The Pagan Pundit
episodes.description: As always, Taliesin Govannon will join us to make heads or tails of what is going on in the world. It's been a sad month and the crazyness seems to be doubling down. Can we get out of the downward spirals this Country seems to be heading in?

episodes.title: Holiday Magick with Danette Wilson
episodes.description: Join us as we bring back the Red Witch, this time with an insider's view as Psychic Reader for the Official Salem Witch's Halloween Ball 2015. We'll talk about Halloween in the Magical town of Salem, go further with Bones and Witch Runes and share some Spells for Holiday Harmony!

episodes.title: Friday the 13th Free night
episodes.description: It's Friday the 13th, are you superstitious? It's also a free night, so the topics will be free flowing.

episodes.title: Pagan Pundit Taliesin Govannon
episodes.description: A funny thing happened on the way to the debate.....EEEK! You asked me mean questions! As we watch the GOP slowly implode upon itself, the debates continue to line up for both parties. Taliesin will be joining us to help straighten out what is going on behind the podiums and why, the bigger the lies, the more popular the Republican candidate. Also, has anyone has put Bobby Jindal on a milk carton yet?

episodes.title: Danette Wilson
episodes.description:
Danette will be doing readings for Raina and Dorian! Red Witch's Journey/Danette Getting into the Magick of the Witch's Runes, Reading with the Bones and Halloween Tarot and Oracle Journey. You can also get some valuable information from her articles in, The Sunday Stew! Join us to see what Danette's reading will have to say....we are excited!

 

You can find Danette on Facebook, Tumblr and Twitter, if you would like to inquire about a reading for yourself!

episodes.title: Season of the Witch
episodes.description: This is a free night, but we will be talking about what has become the Season of the Witch in the Northern Hemisphere. Mercury goes direct, the leaves are changing and air is cooling, Pagan festivities are underway across the land and Hollywood is releasing at least two movies about Witches in a not so favorable light.....but hey, who am I to complain if Vin Diesel wants to chase me ;)

episodes.title: Oompa Loompas and Other Endangered Republican Species
episodes.description: The Pagan Pundit is back and there is much to cover! From the Papal visit, John Boehner's aprupt retirement and what it's impact will be in congress.....and yet another school shooting.

episodes.title: Autumn Equinox Free Night
episodes.description: Join us the night before we venture off to the Piedmont Pagan Pride Day where we will be hanging with friends and the amazing Selena Fox! We will touch on Autumn Equinox, Mabon and probably veer off the rails from there.

episodes.title: Just because you're ahead in a poll doesn't mean you're winning.
episodes.description: The Pagan Pundit, Taliesin Govannon joins us to talk about the whacky world of politics and what those rascals in Washington are up to now. We will talk about the GOP debate, Trump and what the early polls really mean. Will the positions remain this far away from the actual election?

episodes.title: Dorothy Morrison
episodes.description:
It's always a fun time when Miss Dorothy is in the house, and she is bringing an exclusive sale with her! Read all about it on our blog and keep an eye out for the sale link *to be launched Friday*

http://desperatehousewitches.blogspot.com/2015/09/the-witch-is-back.html

episodes.title: Free Night!
episodes.description:
Raina and Dorian chat freely about what's going on in the world and our worlds, the Super moon, latest projects and a whole lot of snarking. We haven't done a free night in a while so tune in to hear the latest and if the cards we pull are for you.

If you would like a private reading, Dorian is available for appointments. Book yours now HERE! And remember, proceeds from Cobaltraven's Magickal Notions help keep our show going.

episodes.title: Author Tonia Brown
episodes.description:
Tonia Brown is a Southern author with a penchant for Victorian dead things. She lives in the backwoods of North Carolina with her genius husband and an ever fluctuating number of cats. She likes fudgesicles and coffee, though not always together. When not writing she raises unicorns and fights crime with her husband under the code names Dr. Weird and his sexy sidekick Butternut. 


	You can read more about her and check out her links HERE

	 


	Join the Face Book fun with Tonia's own chat page! HERE

episodes.title: Danette Wilson
episodes.description: Danette joins us for the first time to talk about magick, writing and life as a witch in general. She is a West Coast witch from San Diego, not too far from Dorian's old stomping grounds. You can read more about our fabulous guest HERE.

episodes.title: Pagan Pundit Night!
episodes.description:
Taliesin Govannon joins us for our first show after our vacation to discuss how Donald Trump could win the GOP nomination, and how Bernie Sanders supporters can help him win.

We are excited to be back with you all and to be discussing this hot topic. We will also try to touch a little bit about the murders in Florida that are being blamed on Wiccan's.

episodes.title: Pagan Politics with Taliesin
episodes.description: It has been an interesting week and a half in the political arena. Marriage, flags, MORE candidates on the Republican side, including Bobby Jindal and his invisible baseball bat, a loud mouth mogule finally put in his place and Bernie is gaining faster than anyone, (except Dorian), thought he would. Join us as Taliesin Govannon explains why this wonderous polar opposite of what we have been living in is taking place.

episodes.title: Jade Sol Luna
episodes.description: Weaver of the Electronica music of Luna 13, Jade Sol Luna, makes his return with tales of his stay at the infamous Cecil Hotel. Come find out what he's been up to. You can find more information on Jade in our latest blog post, and by following him and his band, (where you can find more videos) on Facebook.

episodes.title: Summer of Dorothy!
episodes.description:
Dorothy Morrison will be joining us just before Midsummer to tell us about her latest goodies. She has a Social Media sale going on right now and supplies are going quickly! You can go straight there, http://wickedwitchstudios.com/SummerSale.html, pick your potions and then go check our blog post, http://desperatehousewitches.blogspot.com/2015/06/the-mistress-of-mojo.html, and check out Dorothy's other offerings. 

 

Be sure to find her on Facebook as well! https://www.facebook.com/pages/Dorothy-Morrison/42414023364?fref=ts

episodes.title: How the Democratic Primary Can Change Politics as We Know It
episodes.description:
Taliesin Govannon joins us for his monthly run down on the whacky world of politics. We will try to get a headcount on who has joined the ever growing GOP side of the race, and who has a shot of winning the crown. We will also find out how the democratic party can posiblly shake things up.

 

https://www.facebook.com/PaganPundit

episodes.title: Free Night
episodes.description:
Let the magickal chat flow and the tarot cards fly!


	Stop by our website to see what's new; http://parismoon.weebly.com/

episodes.title: Magic on the Streets w/ Andrieh Vitimus
episodes.description:
Author, Spiritual Coach, Teacher, Hypnotherapist and Chaos Magician extrodinare joins us to talk about the waning use of actual magick in witchcraft.

"Transformation means risk. Pain. Suffering. Growth. Real spiritual encounters, whether internal or external, causes these." ~Andrieh

http://magicblog.andriehvitimus.com/2015/04/break-virus-paganism-needs-real-magic.html

 

To find more on Mr. Vitimus, please visit his website: http://andriehvitimus.com/

episodes.title: The Marco Rubio and Ted Cruz Comedy Special
episodes.description:
That's right, it's Pagan Pundit time again! This witty title brought to you by Taliesin Govannon himself. 

Cue the circus music, the clowns are at it again. We will be discussing the latest goings on in DC, what rugs are trying to be pulled out from the American people, what impact Bernie Sander's bid for President will have on HIllary's campaign, and who has dropped out or joined up from the Republican ring.

 

We would also like to wish you a VERY happy Belatane!

episodes.title: Absolute Beginners
episodes.description:
New to the path and confused by all the information out there? Most of us start out on this path alone, some with a group, but what should you know about starting out? It can be confusing. What herbs, books and tools should you get? Should you join a coven or stay solitary? How do you even begin to find a coven if you want to join? 

 

Fear not, we will try to answer those questions and more for you! We will give you a few good Pagan resources and tips. Dorian has put together a series of beginners magickal kits as well to get you started with building your magickal cabinet.

http://parismoon.weebly.com/cobaltravens-magickal-notions.html

Bruce and Sharon run The Indigo Cresent and coordinate large Pagan festivals in Florida as well as topping our favorite couples list.
